topic.title: Task types
topic.shortdesc: Task types were defined to ease understanding their business nature. From the business point of view we may divide all possible tasks into separate domains: Functional Tasks and Product tasks. Tasks are divided into types within each domain and may be divided into subtypes.

body.p: Functional Tasks domain comprises all banking tasks which bank employees and their clients handle using DBOS. Moreover this domain comprises all tasks that are need to be done to install and maintenance DBOS and front-end applications. Functional domain tasks are divided into seven types, each task type may have subtypes. Example, Functional tasks/Business tasks/Payment tasks/...

Product Tasks domain comprises all tasks which manufacturer handle to design, produce, sale, deliver and putting its products to use. Product domain tasks are divided into types. Product task types are associated with enterprise processes. Each task type may have subtypes.
